short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring relationship insights into Attio from LinkedIn, Twitter, Google Meets, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attio’s browser extension does all the heavy-lifting for you, wherever you are on the web. With a click, you can add a lead from LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, or even your Google Meets call, straight into your workspace, all enriched with valuable data.

You can do so much more with Attio’s browser extension:

• Run automations to speed up your workflow
• Edit custom attributes
• Edit data from associated lists and companies
• And everything’s synced in real-time

This is only a small part of what Attio can do. Find out more at http://attio.com
